author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Excise Department in puducherry has warned of stringent action against the arrack vendors who supply liquor on production of tokens provided by any political organisation or candidates. The department had meeting with arrack outlet owners.

Abel Rozario, Deputy Commissioner, Excise Department, said that they should submit details such as daily stock and sale to the Election Department. – Special Correspondent
title: Warning to arrack vendors
